original: Börjeson, Arvid Gustaf Edvard, landsfiskal, Sävedalen, f. 12/8/95 i He-de, Gbgs o. Boh. 1., av Ernst B. o. Anna Timoteison. G. 24 m. Jane Rho-din. Barn: Oiof f. 25, jur. stud., Ingrid 27, Kerstin 28, Mona 35. — Realex. 12, landsfiskalsex. 21. Prakt. v. Gbgs det. polis 21, tf. landskansl. i Gbg, tf. landsfisk. i ol. distr. i Gbgs o. Boh. 1. t. 25, landsfisk. i Bullarens 25, e. landsfiskal i Askims 26-31, landsfiskal i La-ne 30, fr. 38 i Sävedals distr. Led. av styr. f. länsavd. av fören. Sv:es landsfiskaler fr. 38, av styr. f. Partille-Sä-vedalens luftsk :fören., sed. 46 ordf. i styr. Riksluftsk:förb. ftjt i guld 43.
translated: Börjeson, Arvid Gustaf Edvard, district prosecutor, Sävedalen, b. August 12, 1895 in He-de, Göteborgs och Bohus län, son of Ernst B. and Anna Timoteison. Married in 1924 to Jane Rodin. Children: Oiof, born in 1925, studying law, Ingrid, born in 1927, Kerstin, born in 1928, Mona, born in 1935. Completed secondary education in 1912, became district prosecutor in 1921. Served as temporary police assistant in Göteborg, temporary district clerk in Göteborgs och Bohus län, and district prosecutor in Bullarens from 1921 to 1925. Later served as district prosecutor in Askims from 1926 to 1931, district prosecutor in Lane in 1930, and district prosecutor in Sävedals in 1938. Member of the board of the local section of the Swedish district prosecutors association from 1938, board member of the Partille-Sävedalens air club, and chairman since 1946. Awarded the gold medal of the National Air Federation in 1943.
